backend/main.mo: Actor defines authorization-backed CRUD for character sheets with default generators for abilities, skills, combat stats, and inventory.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables using OKLCH plus global styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that switches between LoginScreen and StockSheetPage based on Internet Identity auth state.
frontend/src/components/EditableSheetTab: Editable table with row add/delete and controlled numeric editing that normalizes quantities to three decimals.
frontend/src/components/FinalCalculation: Card component displaying formatted opening, purchase, sales, suspense, and closing totals.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login view with Internet Identity sign‑in button and basic status messaging.
frontend/src/components/SectionCard.tsx: Wrapper card for sheet sections showing a title, content, and a section total.
frontend/src/components/UserMenu.tsx: User menu providing sign‑out that clears identity and React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using AuthClient, including loading, saving, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockSheet.ts: React hook managing stock sheet loading and saving via React Query, currently backed by localStorage until backend support exists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and print-optimized styles for A5 sheets.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/StockSheetPage.tsx: Page component for editing, calculating totals, saving, and printing a stock sheet with multiple item categories.
frontend/src/types/stockSheet.ts: Type definitions for stock sheet rows, full sheet structure, and table column metadata.
frontend/src/utils/defaultSheetState.ts: Generates a default stock sheet with preset rows and quantities for each category.
frontend/src/utils/numberFormat.ts: Helpers for parsing, validating, formatting, and normalizing numeric input to fixed 3-decimal values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, issues, and features for building a responsive Excel-style stock calculation app with strict formatting and print rules.
